Module the_project
Package days_date_time

Class DateTime

java.lang.Object
days_date_time.DateTime
public class DateTime extends Object
This is a Boundary Class; as it is used as a user interface; Interface which allows the user to user input to record date and time of either guest check-in or check-out. While loop used to ensure that the input entered is correct
Since:
2022-03-15
Version:
7.0
Author:
Isaac, Yan kai, Davis, Wenlu, Tomoki

    • getLocalDateTime

      public static LocalDateTime getLocalDateTime(String text)
      Accepts user input to record date and time of either guest check-in or check-out;
      Parameters:
      text - user inputs either "check-in" or "check-out" to indicate type of datetime recorded;
      Returns:
      one summarised line of check-in/check-out date and time
